title: The Animals are crying
creator_credit: Peter Beltz, Paul Martin Smith and PMS Films
brief_description: This film shows how pet owners fail to understand the responsibility of raising animals by telling about the garbage men who almost discard a box until they realise there are live kittens in it. Also suggests owners spay their female cats. (Short version). Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
